name: Murder Clown
description:
A game inside a clown's mind inside a clown's mouth.

"Seem­ingly Point­less of course, couldn't be less extrav­a­gant than the oth­ers, and with their Mur­der Clown they almost man­aged to scare me off." - CreepyGaming.net

"It's too early in the morn­ing for this bull­shit." — Markiplier

Game 42 of 100 in 5 years
